actions.text: On agreeing to the LaTourette amendments (A031) Agreed to by recorded vote: 220 - 206 (Roll no. 660).
Amendments en bloc (A031) offered by Mr. LaTourette.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the LaTourette amendments (A031) Agreed to by recorded vote: 220 - 206 (Roll no. 660).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendments en bloc (A031) offered by Mr. LaTourette.

description: Amendments en bloc reduce the Science and Technology research and development account under EPA by $20 million; increase the Environmental Programs and Management account by $13 million; increase the funding for specified Geographic Programs by $50 million and increase the funding for the Great Lakes Restoration Initiative by $50 million.
purpose: An amendment comprised of several amendments offered en bloc: reduce the Science and Technology account by $20 million and increase the Environmental Programs and Management account by $13 million, increase the funding for the Geographic Programs by $50 million and increase the funding for the Great Lakes Initiative by $50 million.
